description: Blue Origin has made history by launching the first wheelchair user to space and safely returning her to Earth. Aerospace engineer Michi Benthaus flew aboard the company’s New Shepard rocket on a brief suborbital mission. The successful flight highlights expanding access to space as commercial missions increasingly include diverse passengers.
title: Blue Origin Launches First Wheelchair User to Space and Back

description: Astronomers studying aging Sun-like stars have found strong evidence that stars consume their closest planets as they evolve. Using data from NASA’s TESS mission, researchers observed fewer planets around older stars, suggesting worlds are destroyed over time. The findings offer a realistic preview of Earth’s fate billions of years from now.
title: Planet-Eating Stars Offer a Glimpse Into Earth’s Fate as the Sun Nears Its Final Stages

description: A new ionic liquid additive developed by researchers at Purdue and Emory universities could transform perovskite solar technology. The compound stabilises crystal growth and buried interfaces, dramatically slowing heat- and light-driven degradation. Solar cells treated with the additive retained about 90% of their efficiency after 1,500 hours at 90°C, outperforming previous records. The approach is compatible with scalable manufacturing, bringing durable, low-cost perovskite photovoltaics closer to real-world use.
title: New Ionic Liquid Breaks Stability Barrier for Perovskite Solar Cells

description: Samsung kicked off the One UI 8.5 beta 2 programme for the Galaxy S25 series earlier this month. Now, the company is rolling out the second beta update. This new build brings multiple bug fixes, addresses system glitches and improves overall stability and performance. The update addresses forced closures of multiple third-party apps.
title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Series Gets One UI 8.5 Beta 2 Update in India With New Improvements, Bug Fixes

description: Outlook offers a message recall feature that can help undo a sent email in limited situations. It works mainly for Microsoft Exchange or Microsoft 365 work or school accounts and only within the same organisation. The process differs slightly across Outlook Desktop (Classic and New) and Outlook on the web. If recall is unavailable or fails, users can rely on the Undo Send option as a safer alternative.
title: How to Recall a Message in Outlook: A Step-by-Step Guide

description: Directed by Hiroshi Ikehata, Kaya-Chan Isn’t Scary is an anime series that follows a kindergarten girl fighting the ghosts to defend her classmates. Further, she will discover hidden secrets about her mother and family.
title: Kaya-Chan Isn’t Scary OTT Release Details: Know Where to Watch This Anime Horror-Comedy Series Online

description: Streaming on Z5, Nayanam stands out as a thought-provoking thriller that combines science fiction with human emotion. Featuring Varun Sandesh in a standout role, the series delivers an engaging narrative filled with suspense, ethical conflicts, and psychological tension, earning praise for its originality and gripping execution.
title: Nayanam Now Available For Streaming Online: What You Need to Know About This Psychological Thriller Online

description: Yann LeCun has confirmed that his new startup is called Advanced Machine Intelligence. The former Meta chief AI scientist will serve as executive chairman, with Nabla co-founder Alex LeBrun as CEO. AMI will focus on world models and has also announced a research partnership with Nabla.
title: Yann LeCun Sets Up Advanced Machine Intelligence AI Startup After Announcing Departure From Meta

description: Brands like iQOO and OnePlus are launching dedicated smartphones aimed at gamers. These gaming-centric models come with high refresh rate displays and the latest processors with powerful GPUs and CPUs, and advanced cooling systems. They also offer larger batteries and fast charging to support longer sessions and quick top-ups. Here are the best gaming phones you can buy under Rs. 50,000 in India.
title: Best Gaming Smartphones Under Rs. 50,000: OnePlus 15R, Realme GT 7 Pro, iQOO Neo 10, More

description: Huawei Nova 15 series, including the Nova 15, Nova 15 Ultra, and Nova 15 Pro, has been launched in China. Currently available for purchase through the Huawei China online store, the phones are offered in three colourways. All phones are powered by Kirin chipsets and run on Harmony OS 6.0. The SoC on the Ultra model is paired with up to 1TB of RAM. The standard Nova 15 carries a triple rear camera setup, headlined by a 50-megapixel main shooter.
title: Huawei Nova 15 Ultra Launched With 6,500mAh Battery, Kirin 9010S Chip, Nova 15 Pro, Nova 15 Tag Along: Price, Features

description: The OnePlus Pad Go 2 is a well-rounded Android tablet aimed at users seeking a reliable, affordable alternative to the base iPad. It offers a sharp 12.1-inch display, strong battery life, and a polished OxygenOS 16 experience with useful multitasking features. Performance is suitable for everyday productivity, streaming, and light gaming, while the built-in 5G adds flexibility on the go. Camera performance and charging speeds are average, but overall, the Pad Go 2 delivers solid value for its price.
title: OnePlus Pad Go 2 Review: An iPad Alternative That Gets Most Things Right

description: OpenAI has rolled out a new personalisation feature for ChatGPT called Characteristics. It lets users fine-tune traits like warmth, enthusiasm, use of lists, and emojis without affecting the chatbot’s core abilities. The controls sit alongside existing personality presets, giving users more say in how ChatGPT sounds during everyday conversations.
title: OpenAI Upgrades ChatGPT With Adjustable Personality Traits, Response Styles

description: Oppo Pad Air 5 is set to launch in China on December 25 as the successor to the smartphone maker’s Pad Air 2.
title: Oppo Pad Air 5 Display, Battery Upgrades Confirmed Ahead of December 25 Launch in China

description: Huawei has launched its Watch 10th Anniversary Edition in China, with prices starting at CNY 2,799 (roughly Rs. 35,700). The smartwatch features a premium titanium or steel build, a bright LTPO AMOLED display, and runs on HarmonyOS 6. It debuts Huawei’s new X-Tap health sensor with ECG, PPG, and quick SpO2 readings. The watch also offers eSIM support, AI-powered voice interactions, gesture controls, and up to 11 days of battery life in power-saving mode.
title: Huawei Watch 10th Anniversary Edition With 1.38-inch LTPO 2.0 AMOLED Screen, HarmonyOS 6 Launched: Price, Features

description: Steam Winter Sale is now live, bringing deep discounts on thousands of games. Game of the Year winner Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 gets a 20 percent discount, while GotY nominee Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 is available at a 50 percent discount. Here are some of the best deals of the Steam sale.
title: Steam Winter Sale Best Deals: Assassin’s Creed Shadows, Arc Raiders, Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 and More

description: Asus VM670KA AiO Copilot+ PC has been launched in India. It packs up to an AMD Ryzen AI 7 350 processor with a dedicated Neural Processing Unit (NPU) that is capable of delivering 50 trillion operations per second (TOPS). The Asus VM670KA AiO features a 27-inch HD IPS screen. The new device has five USB ports and offers Wi-Fi 7 connectivity.
title: Asus VM670KA AiO All-in-One Desktop PC With 27-Inch Display, Ryzen AI 7 350 Chip Launched in India

description: Perplexity sent an email to Airtel users on Monday, asking them to add card information to continue to keep the free trial of its Pro plan.
title: How to Keep Your Free Perplexity Pro on Airtel: New Card Requirement Explained

description: According to a tipster, OnePlus is developing a new smartphone for both India and the global markets, powered by Qualcomm’s Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 processor. The mystery handset is tipped to have the codename ‘Volkswagen’, and its specifications match the leaked information about the OnePlus Turbo, which is expected to debut China soon.
title: OnePlus Phone Codenamed ‘Volkswagen’ With Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 Chip Tipped to Launch in India, Global Markets

description: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms is an upcoming prequel to Game of Thrones, which is set to land on digital screens.
title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms OTT Release: Know When and Where to Watch This Prequel of Game of Thrones

description: Samsung will showcase new Bespoke AI kitchen appliances at CES 2026 in Las Vegas from January 6 to January 9, highlighting vision-based AI built with Google Gemini and Google Cloud. The lineup includes updated refrigerators, microwaves, slide-in ranges, and a new AI Wine Cellar. The Bespoke AI Refrigerator debuts Gemini integration for improved food recognition and inventory tracking. Samsung will also present refreshed designs with zero-clearance refrigerators, redesigned ranges, and improved ventilation in new over-the-range microwaves.
title: CES 2026: Samsung to Expand Bespoke Appliances With Improved AI Vision, Google Gemini AI

description: A US lawsuit against OpenAI has intensified, with a lawyer calling ChatGPT’s personalisation “particularly dangerous.” The case links the chatbot to reinforcing paranoia before a murder-suicide. OpenAI is accused of withholding key chat records while saying it is improving how ChatGPT responds to signs of mental distress.
title: ChatGPT Agreeing With Users is Dangerous, Says Lawyer in Murder-Suicide Case: Report

description: Nobody 2 is an American action thriller film that is now streaming on digital screens. The film will follow Hutch Mansell reconnecting with his family, but what unfolds next is worth watching.
title: Nobody 2 Now Streaming Online: Know Everything About This American Action Thriller Film

description: Osiris stands out as a dark, action-packed sci-fi thriller that merges military combat with alien horror. Directed by William Kaufman, the film delivers relentless pacing, eerie spaceship visuals, and survival tension, making it a compelling watch for audiences who enjoy gritty extraterrestrial thrillers now streaming on JioHotstar.
title: Osiris Now Streaming on JioHotstar: Everything You Need to Know

description: Redmi Pad 2 Pro 5G is confirmed to launch in the second week of January next year, the company has announced. Additionally, the Xiaomi sub-brand has revealed that the tablet will pack a 12,000mAh battery, which is claimed to be the largest on tablet with a 12.1-inch display. These specifications are similar to the Redmi Pad 2 Pro 5G's global counterpart, which debuted in select European countries in September.
title: Redmi Pad 2 Pro 5G India Launch Date Announced; Teaser Confirms 12,000mAh Battery

description: Written and directed by JK Chandru, Revolver Rita is a Tamil dark comedy film that stars Keerthy Suresh in the lead role. Streaming soon.
title: Revolver Rita OTT Release Date Revealed: Know Everything About Streaming, Plot, Cast, and More

description: In a recent interview, Instagram head Adam Mosseri outlined where the platform may be headed in the coming years, with the aim of taking on short-form content platforms like TikTok and YouTube. The official hinted at deeper investments in long-form videos, premium content, and new technologies that could change how people interact with the app beyond their phones.
title: Instagram Could Embrace Long-Form Video, Premium Content to Compete With TikTok, Says Adam Mosseri

description: Oppo Reno 15 series is set to launch in India soon. Ahead of its debut, the company has revealed the names of the models that will be included in the lineup, along with their specifications and colourways. The upcoming Reno 15 series is confirmed to include the Reno 15 Pro Mini, Reno 15 Pro, and Reno 15. Moreover, a dedicated microsite for the upcoming smartphones has gone live on Flipkart, confirming their availablity via the e-commerce platform.
title: Oppo Reno 15 Pro Mini Confirmed to Launch in India Along With Reno 15, Reno 15 Pro; Flipkart Availability Announced

description: Apple is expected to debut its first foldable iPhone in 2026, and Samsung is reportedly gearing up to counter it with a wider version of the Galaxy Z Fold, called the “Wide Fold.” Samsung Wide Fold will reportedly feature a 7.6-inch inner display. It is tipped to support  25W wireless charging. The display and dimensions of the  Samsung Wide Fold are said to be similar to the rumoured dimensions of the iPhone Fold.
title: Samsung 'Wide Fold’ Will Reportedly Compete With Apple’s First Foldable iPhone in 2026

description: Crypto markets remained cautious on Monday, with Bitcoin hovering near the $90,000 zone and Ethereum staying above $3,000. Dense liquidity, mixed ETF flows, and uncertainty around upcoming US macro data kept traders selective. Analysts said markets are consolidating, with investors watching key resistance and support levels before committing fresh capital.
title: Crypto Market Consolidation Continues as Bitcoin Tests Resistance Near $90,000

description: Samsung Galaxy S26 series, including the Galaxy S26, Galaxy S26+, and Galaxy S26 Ultra, will reportedly launch globally, including in India, in February next year. While the company has yet to schedule its Galaxy Unpacked 2026 event for its launch, rumours regarding the same have been surfacing online for a while. Now, two tipsters have separately shared that the company is planning to bring the Galaxy S26 series to market in March 2026, while launching it in February next year.
title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Series Will Go on Sale a Month After Anticipated Launch, Tipster Claims

description: Record AI investment and infrastructure spending have sparked debate over a potential bubble. While leaders like Sam Altman and Sarah Friar point to adoption and momentum, figures such as Bill Gates, Demis Hassabis and Bridgewater Associates warn of overvaluation and risk. Surging deals, high commitments and revenue gaps underpin the scrutiny as markets weigh long-term sustainability.
title: The AI Bubble Question: What Is It and Should You Be Worried About an Implosion?

description: Xiaomi will expand its product lineup on December 25 with the launch of the Watch 5 and Buds 6 alongside the already confirmed Xiaomi 17 Ultra. The Watch 5 will debut as Xiaomi’s flagship smartwatch, powered by the Snapdragon W5 platform and featuring the brand’s first EMG sensor for gesture-based controls. Meanwhile, the Buds 6 will arrive as flagship semi-in-ear earbuds, promising CD-level lossless audio and AI-powered features such as recording, translation, and summarisation.
title: Xiaomi Watch 5 With EMG Sensor, Xiaomi Buds 6 Confirmed to Launch Alongside Xiaomi 17 Ultra

description: Google is working on upgrading the mobile Assistant devices to Gemini. Google says it will continue its work to upgrade Assistant users to Gemini on mobile devices into 2026. The company did not reveal an exact date for the transition. In March this year, Google announced plans to upgrade Assistant to Gemini on most mobile devices by the end of 2025.
title: Google Revises Timeline to Replace Assistant With Gemini on Android Smartphones

description: OnePlus 15R has gone on sale in India after its launch last week, with prices starting at Rs. 47,999. The smartphone features a 6.83-inch 165Hz AMOLED display, Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 chipset, and a 50-megapixel Sony primary camera with OIS. It packs a 7,400mAh battery with 80W fast charging and runs on Android 16-based OxygenOS 16 out of the box. Buyers can avail bank discounts, EMI options, and added warranty benefits.
title: OnePlus 15R With 7,400mAh Battery, 50-Megapixel Rear Camera Goes on Sale in India: Price, Offers, Features

description: Valve says it has stopped production of the 256GB Steam Deck LCD model. The company said that once out of stock, Steam Deck LCD will no longer be available. Steam Deck LCD was launched in 2022 in 64GB, 256GB, and 512GB variants. Valve has only been selling the 256GB LCD model since it launched Steam Deck OLED in 2023.
title: Valve Discontinues Production of Steam Deck LCD Model Weeks After Announcing Steam Machine

description: iQOO Z11 Turbo is teased to launch soon. It is confirmed to be available in a blue finish. The handset is speculated to run on the Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 processor. It could come with a 6.59-inch display with 1.5K resolution. It could run on a Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 processor and a 3D ultrasonic fingerprint sensor. The battery capacity is likely to be more than 7,600mAh.
title: iQOO Z11 Turbo Design Teased; Could Launch With 6.59-Inch Display, Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 SoC

description: OnePlus Turbo is expected to launch in China in January next year. The President of OnePlus China had recently confirmed that the tech firm is planning to unveil the smartphone soon. However, its key specifications and features remain under wraps. Now, the smartphone has reportedly been spotted on the Geekbench benchmarking platform, revealing its chipset, performance, RAM, and Android version. It might be powered by an octa core Snapdragon chipset.
title: OnePlus Turbo Reportedly Listed on Geekbench With Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 SoC: Expected Specifications, Features

description: The Oppo Find X9 Ultra is rumoured to be launched in China soon as the top-of-the-line model in the Find X9 series. Details about its camera system have now been leaked. According to a tipster, the upcoming flagship will feature a quad rear camera setup, headlined by dual 200-megapixel cameras. The Oppo Find X9 Ultra is said to be equipped with a 200-megapixel primary camera and a 200-megapixel periscope telephoto lens.
title: Oppo Find X9 Ultra Camera Specifications Leak Ahead of Launch; May Feature 200-Megapixel Main, Telephoto Sensors

description: The Oppo Reno 15 Series 5G was launched in China in November and is expected to make its way to the global markets soon. The company has now confirmed the launch of the smartphones in India, too. The teaser video, posted on a social media site, provides a glimpse at one of the upcoming models in blue and white colourways. According to a tipster, an unprecedented four Reno 15 Series 5G smartphones are expected to be launched in the country.
title: Oppo Reno 15 Series 5G Confirmed to Launch in India Soon; Four Models Tipped to Debut

description: Poco has teased the launch of new M-series smartphones in India, hinting at an imminent debut. Reports suggest the lineup will include the Poco M8 and Poco M8 Pro, possibly rebranded versions of the Redmi Note 15 series. Leaks point to differences between Indian and global variants, especially in camera hardware. Both phones have surfaced in renders and certifications, revealing multiple colour options, triple rear cameras, and hole-punch displays, indicating that official launch details could be announced soon.
title: Poco M8 Series India Launch Teased; Poco M8 and M8 Pro Expected to Debut

description: Xiaomi 17 Ultra will be launched in China this week, the company announced via social media on Monday. It is expected to arrive as the successor to the Xiaomi 15 Ultra, positioned as the top-of-the-line model in the latest flagship Xiaomi 17 series. The China-based company has also revealed the design of the upcoming model. The Xiaomi 17 Ultra shares several design elements with its predecessor, including a large circular camera deco placed centrally at the rear panel.
title: Xiaomi 17 Ultra China Launch Date Announced; Design and ‘Starry’ Green Colourway Revealed
